Text: The top representative of values that clash head-on with fundamental American ones carries on with his crusade of bigotry.

What American values are you taking about, Sister? Give me a few examples: Free health care, government taking over car companies, welfare expansion, a dictator president?

I hate to break it to you but American values are CONSERVATIVE. In fact,

 "The facts of life are conservative" - Margaret Thatcher
sistromoo the uneducated racist... I've lost count of your contradictions.

Oh, now I remember- Rush the conservative capitalist is a racist nazi socialist... LMFAO!

sistromoo, you're good for a laugh.
Just ignore sistro and maybe he'll go away. The worst you can do is reply as it feeds his narcissism. Sad and lonely is as sad and lonely does.
